description: Israel launched retaliatory strikes within Lebanon, more than 100 miles from Gaza, against Hezbollah. Israeli authorities say the Iranian-backed militant group is responsible for an attack that killed 12 children and teens on a soccer field in an Israeli territory. NBC News’ Meagan Fitzgerald reports on the rising temperatures in the region.
title: Israel retaliates at Hezbollah for attack that killed 12 children and teens

description: The UNESCO World Heritage committee on Saturday decided to register Japan’s controversial Sado gold mine as a cultural heritage site after the country agreed to include it in an exhibit of its dark history of abusing Korean laborers during World War II.
title: Japan’s Sado gold mine gains UNESCO status after Tokyo pledges to exhibit dark WWII history

description: At least 12 people were killed after a mudslide hit a homestay house in a tourist area in southeastern China on Sunday as heavy rains from what remained of a tropical storm drenched the region, state media said.
title: At least 12 killed by mudslide in China as heavy rains from tropical storm Gaemi drench region

description: The Israel Defense Forces said they have hit seven targets “deep inside Lebanese territory” on Sunday in retaliation for a strike on a soccer field that killed at least 12 children and teenagers.
title: Israel retaliates in Lebanon after strike on Golan Heights soccer field kills at least 12
